name: Planeswalker's Favor
originalText:
o3o
G: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: If the opponent has no cards in hand, then X is zero.

text: {3}{G}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value.
